This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sweep)
library(timetk)
library(lubridate)
library(gridExtra)

```

```{r}
data("bike_sales")
bike <- bike_sales%>%mutate(order.date= as_date(zoo::as.yearmon(order.date)))%>%
  group_by(order.date, category.secondary)%>%
  summarise(qty=sum(quantity))
```

```{r}
bike%>%
  ggplot(aes(order.date, qty), group = category.secondary)+
  geom_line(aes(color= category.secondary))

```
